original: 《 武將年齡增衰 》若開創新局，選擇有年齡增衰的挑戰模式，武將的能力將與年齡有連動關係。請珍惜並善於調度那些身強體壯、處於巔峰時期的武將們吧！
text: "Age of Generals" If you start a new game, choose a challenge mode with age, and the abilities of generals will be linked to your age. Please cherish and be good at scheduling those generals who are strong and at their peak!
